item.title: 印尼央行称仍有进一步下调关键利率的空间
item.description: 印尼央行行长佩里-瓦尔吉约（Perry Warjiyo）表示，印尼央行正在寻找进一步下调基准利率的空间，并预测未来两年经济将强劲增长，尽管存在一系列全球风险，包括贸易形势和脆弱的市场。【原文：Bank Indonesia is looking for room to further cut its benchmark interest rate, Governor Perry Warjiyo said, forecasting robust economic growth in the next two years despite a range of global risks including the trade situation and fragile markets.】

item.title: 惠誉评级上调，赞比亚摈弃五年违约标签
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）将赞比亚的信用等级上调至 B-，前景稳定。赞比亚美元债券收益率走低。【原文：Zambia has shaken off five years with a debt-default tag, with Fitch Ratings upgrading its assessment of the southern African nation’s credit to B- and a stable outlook. Yields on its dollar bond edged lower.】

item.title: 博洛雷获法院支持避免维旺迪股东赔款
item.description: 文森特-博洛雷（Vincent Bolloré）在争取避免向维旺迪公司（Vivendi SE）股东支付可能代价高昂的赔偿金（作为去年媒体集团解体的一部分）的斗争中，得到了法国最高法院的支持。【原文：Vincent Bolloré got a boost from France’s top court in his fight to avoid a potentially costly payout to Vivendi SE shareholders as part of last year’s breakup of the media conglomerate.】

item.title: 德国通胀跃升至九个月高点，欧洲央行思考前景
item.description: 德国通胀率意外升至九个月来的最高水平，在欧洲中央银行今年最后一次会议之前提醒人们，物价稳定的风险依然存在。【原文：Germany’s inflation rate unexpectedly rose to the highest level in nine months, offering a reminder before the European Central Bank’s final meeting of the year that risks to price stability remain.】

item.title: 纹身墨水在体内移动，杀死免疫细胞，削弱疫苗反应
item.description: 纹身墨水并不只是静静地留在皮肤里。新的研究表明，纹身墨水会迅速进入淋巴系统，并在那里存留数月，杀死免疫细胞，甚至干扰人体对疫苗的反应。【原文：Tattoo ink doesn’t just sit inertly in the skin. New research shows it moves rapidly into the lymphatic system, where it can persist for months, kill immune cells, and even disrupt how the body responds to vaccines.】

item.title: 马歇尔-韦斯将向客户收取聘用人工智能人才的费用
item.description: 在激烈的人才争夺战中，选股对冲基金马歇尔-韦斯（Marshall Wace）将开始让客户为招聘和留住技术、交易和风险人员的成本上涨买单。【原文：Stock-picking hedge fund Marshall Wace will start making clients pay for the rising costs of hiring and retaining technology, trading and risk personnel amid an intense war for talent.】

item.title: 普拉达对范思哲进行改造，防止近期内出现更多收购行为
item.description: Prada SpA 首席执行官 Andrea Guerra 表示，Prada SpA 将在未来三年内对范思哲品牌进行改造，并不打算在此期间进行任何进一步的收购。【原文：Prada SpA will be occupied for the next three years revamping the Versace brand and doesn’t plan to make any further acquisitions in that time frame, Chief Executive Andrea Guerra said.】

item.description: 该石油生产国集团明年可能不得不面对创纪录的供应过剩问题，从而加大了提高产量的难度。【原文：The oil producer group may have to contend with a record glut next year, making it harder to raise output.】

item.title: 芝加哥商品交易所（CME）故障引发的沮丧和困惑波及整个市场
item.description: 芝加哥商业交易所集团自豪地将自己描述为 "世界来此管理风险的地方"。但周五，世界被拒之门外。【原文：The Chicago Mercantile Exchange Group proudly describes itself as the place “where the world comes to manage risk.” Except on Friday, the world was shut out.】

item.title: 人工智能发电量激增后，美国公用事业股为何下跌？
item.description: 人工智能热潮带来的电力需求激增承诺，使美国电力公司的股价飙升至历史新高。但这些发电公司和公用事业公司现在才知道，炒作是有风险的：投资者不会永远等待结果。【原文：The artificial-intelligence boom’s promise of runaway electricity demand has jolted shares of US power companies to all-time highs. But those generators and utilities are now learning that the hype comes with an edge: Investors won’t wait forever for results.】

item.title: CDS 赔付率的不确定性将投资者挤出阿达赫交易
item.description: 在爱尔兰玻璃瓶和包装生产商 Ardagh Group SA 可能达成和解之前，信用违约掉期支付规则的不确定性给交易商带来了困惑。【原文：Uncertainty over the rules governing the payout of credit default swaps has sown confusion among traders ahead of a potential settlement tied to Ardagh Group SA, the Irish glass bottle and packaging maker.】

item.title: 对冲基金称英国央行回购改革有可能损害英国国债的吸引力

item.title: 意大利第三季度经济仍略有增长
item.description: 在国内需求的支持下，意大利第三季度经济略有增长，而不是像原先预计的那样停滞不前。【原文：Italy managed to notch up some slight growth in the third quarter amid support from domestic demand, instead of just stagnating as originally estimated.】

item.title: 尽管美国加征关税，印度经济增长仍为六季以来最快
item.description: 尽管美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收的高额关税给经济前景蒙上了阴影，但印度经济仍以六个季度以来最快的速度增长，彰显了印度经济的韧性。【原文：India’s economy grew at the fastest pace in six quarters, underscoring its resilience even as US President Donald Trump’s steep tariffs cloud the outlook.】

item.title: 智利总统何塞-安东尼奥-卡斯特在总统选举民调中领先二十个百分点
item.description: 一项新的民意调查显示，智利极端保守派总统候选人何塞-安东尼奥-卡斯特（José Antonio Kast）在 12 月的决选前领先其左派竞选者约 20 个百分点，因为选民对他的看法有所改善。【原文：Chile’s ultra-conservative presidential candidate José Antonio Kast opened up a roughly twenty-point lead over his leftist contender ahead of the December runoff as voter perceptions of him improved, according to a new poll.】

item.title: 在贸易谈判中反击特朗普，卡尼需要一本新剧本
item.description: 马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）是以经济危机斗士的形象在加拿大上台的，他能够修复加拿大与美国破裂的关系。在他赢得全国大选七个月后，加拿大的经济仍处于脆弱状态，与特朗普政府的贸易休战也一直遥遥无期。【原文：Mark Carney came to power in Canada by pitching himself as an economic crisis fighter who could fix the country’s ruptured relationship with the US. Seven months after he won a national election, the economy is in a fragile state, and a trade truce with the Trump administration has been elusive.】
